"Amazing lawn maintenance service with a lot of heart"

Testimonials

Quick Introduction

Established in 2015, Durham Lawn Care sought to bring a much needed, caring touch to the lawn maintenance industry in the Ark-La-Tex. The founder, Dustin Durham, decided Texarkana was the best place as it was centrally located. He has swept the area showing his care and dedication to his work. Whether it's landscaping or a weekly lawn maintenance job, the Durham Lawn care team shows up to impress with their honed skills.

Allow us to show you, with confidence, the Durham Lawn Care motto.

Excellent Services

We aim to provide the services that our clientele requires and to do it at the highest quality.

Year Round Maintenance

Your yard should look immaculant 52 weeks a year.

Quality and Reliability

We hire the best workers and utilize the best equipment so we can provide reliability to our customers.

Get Your Project Started

Our Services

Lawn Maintenance

A traditional mowing of the grounds. This includes cutting the
grass, edging concrete, trimming around objects with weedeaters, trash/limb/branch removal and blowing off concrete where needed.

Pruning Shrubs/Trees

Year round, Durham Lawn Care will trim and prune any trees, shrubs, or bushes that you would like us to take care of. We know the best intervals to make them beautiful.

Sod & Turf Installation

Purchasing, transporting, and installing sod/turf is a project that Durham Lawn Care is perfect for. Contact us for details.

Power Washing

Durham Lawn Care provides a pressure washing service to clean
off concrete surfaces in your yard or on the grounds of a commercial business.

Flower Bed Installation & Other Landscaping

We build flower beds, plant flowers, place flower bed
lining, and install edging. We can handle all of your flower bed projects. We also do various other landscaping projects.

Mulch & Gravel Laying

Durham Lawn Care takes pride in purchasing, transporting, and laying mulch and gravel in your flowerbeds. We gauranteed the safety of your plants as well.

Fall Leaf Cleanup

During the Fall, Durham Lawn Care offers leaf cleanup and mulching. This ensures your yards look tidy and clean during the Autumn season.

Relocation Services

Sometimes previous projects get in the way in your yard and
you'd like to move them to a different location. Durham Lawn Care can help with relocating them for you.

Why Choose Us?

Whether you are value-minded or a perfectionist, our service is ideal for your lawn maintenance and landscaping projects in Texarkana. To explain further why Durham Lawn Care is right for you, we broke it down into four points.

Agriculture Experts

We were born with green thumbs.

Home Gardening

Miniture home oasis designing at its finest.

Clean Working

We clean every mess we make, big or small.

Proper Care

Your plants and grass will love us. Don't be jealous.

Meet Our Team

Dustin Durham - Owner, Manager

Mr. Durham has been associated with the lawn and landscaping industry for decades. His expertise is profound as is his dedication to good customer service.
